name: Focus Home Interactive
detail:
Focus Home Interactive SA is a French independent video game publisher and distributor based in Paris, France. Founded in 1996, Focus has published and distributed original titles such as Sherlock Holmes, TrackMania, Runaway and sports games like Cycling Manager and Virtual Skipper.

On 25 June 2010, it was announced that Focus had acquired the Cities XL franchise from now defunct Monte Cristo.

works.name: Curse of the Dead Gods / 无间冥寺
